Articles.Content:
Hey everyone,

I thought I would share a couple of pictures I drew in the last couple of days.

Until now they really are just sketches, so expect me to work on them at a later point in time, I just thought with 0.24 around the corner the first picture might be outdated before I'm finished with it:

(aquarell) / (digital rework - although I guess it's obvious I don't know how that's done )

and since I was scanning anyway, I thought I might aswell add this:

(pen)

I am not sure if I uploaded the picture too small, feedback on that would be nice too

I hope you enjoy, any constructive critizism is appreciated

Edited July 8, 2014 by Schmonzo

while waiting for feedback I drew this:

(pencil)

this time I looked at an actual picture taken from KSP, so it's not so original...

Edited July 8, 2014 by Schmonzo

okay, got a last one for today, it's called 'waiting for the transfer window'

(pencil)

Nice , kinda wish I could draw like that but all I seem to be able to draw is ships/vehicles/machines, i.e non-organic:huh:

Also when I saw 'waiting for the transfer window' I though it was going to be called 'waiting for a response'.

Also when I saw 'waiting for the transfer window' I though it was going to be called 'waiting for a response'.

that was actually what I was thinking, but then I noticed that it seems to take about 100 people to post one comment on an [Artwork] thread, so I guess I gotta be patient

So thats our contractor that gives unlimited budget to the space agency,not quite who you would expect.

Anyhow cool doodles my favorite is the one on the 2nd post.
finally got a new one, the colors are much brighter than they looked when I made this. Also this is my first try at illustrator and I know it's not optimal, so please be gentle with your comments
yiur green skin needs much more yellow added to it. It's too dark green.

you really think? I shall try for the next picture then, but personally I feel the colour is the least of my artistic struggles right now

Anyway, thanks for the feedback Gregrox

I like that last one. Your kerbals all look like they have guts, and attitude.

Also, the code for the official colour is #BADA55, but I quite like the style you've got going with these darker ones.

Edited July 28, 2014 by Tw1

I like that last one. Your kerbals all look like they have guts, and attitude.

Also, the code for the official colour is #BADA55, but I quite like the style you've got going with these darker ones.

Correction: the middle is correct:
My mistake. Looks like I copied the wrong code.

dang, never would have thought they had to be that bright! I must admit though, that since I started this thread I have not had the time to play (I know, I haven't touched 0.24 yet), since I am writing my bachelor thesis right now.

Thanks for all the feedback, it really is more fun to draw if you know someone looks at the pictures afterwards. And now that I have the official color codes (they are official right, also where can I find those?) the next kerbals shall be colored correctly
I like that first one. Scrooge Kerman!

Thanks for the nice feedback everyone, I am nearly finished with my bachelors thesis now, but am going on a 2 week vacation this weekend. After that I shall resume drawing brighter colored kerbals! Looking forward to you feedback on those!
